body:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ok, so as Mojang announced the official name change for tomorrow, I'm going to go ahead and make this post to prevent further spam, basically, this post is made for saying what was your old IGN so that everyone can know who you were before, this will be very helpful and would avoid posts like "Hi I'm Example!" so, yeah, if you do change your name, make sure to post your old name down here. I'll be updating the post everyday so don't worry!
Thanks!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
body_tagged:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ok, so as Mojang announced the official name change for tomorrow, I'm going to go ahead and make this post to prevent further spam, basically, this post is made for saying what was your old IGN so that everyone can know who you were before, this will be very helpful and would avoid posts like "Hi I'm Example!" so, yeah, if you do change your name, make sure to post your old name down here. I'll be updating the post everyday so don't worry!
Thanks!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
